name: Crunch Point
overview: Crunch Point is a side scrolling SHMUP with music by Wally Beben, published in Italy in Hit Parade C64 n.33 (Aprile 1989) under the title, Flashing. The spy sensors sent inside the alien base on the distant moon of Evans have unfortunately revealed that what we most feared has happened. The evil scientist has been able to send mind control generators to all the planets to carry out his ambitious and crazy project to rule us all. The rulers immediately recognized that he cannot be allowed to control galaxy and have sent a fighter inside his secret base to search and to destroy the heart of the dangerous device. The robot guardians there will not stand idly by and will try in every way to hinder you, but for our worlds and minds to survive, you MUST!
